Detail:
Total Coliform Testing is required for :

* Each CCA month water is operational (From the month Water of Water Startup) to the month Water is shutdown/drained. 

* The Total Colifom Test for the month Water of Water Startup must be performed immediately after executing the Water Startup Procedure mandated by NYSDOH.

* See Total Coliform Section in the above PDF file : 
 SOP-23 Water Testing.pdf
Title: Total Coliform Water Test
